mapper.select: select l.*,p.positionName,p.positionId,d.departmentName,d.departmentId,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,s.WORK_STATUS from staff_leave l left join position p on l.positionId=p.positionId left join department d on l.departmentId=d.departmentId left join staff_info s on l.sta_staff_id=s.staff_id where s.WORK_STATUS=2 order by l.LEAVE_ID asc
